name: Blocky's day out
description:
Short little Puzzle Platformer.  Help Blocky get through the Portals. No matter the cost.

Originally this game was designed for the game jam Ludum Dare 44, but due to time constrains it wasn't finished. I added the missing 5% of code and some basic levels to it after the deadline.

Currently it only has  10 Levels. I might add more later.

Made with:

  • Godot v3.1
  • Gimp 2.10
  • Bfxr v1.4.1

If anyone is interessed in the sourcecode (bad game jam code without comments) i could upload it to github. Just leave a commend.
